t: Amazon EC2 Spot Instances - Product Details

t: Spot Instances - Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud
s: A Spot Instance is an instance that uses spare EC2 capacity that is available for less than the On-Demand price. Because Spot Instances enable you to request unused EC2 instances at steep discounts, you can lower your Amazon EC2 costs significantly. The hourly price for a Spot Instance is called ...
